thread.title: Great Location but noisy during night - Review
thread.title_full: Great Location but noisy during night - Review of DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JoyCyprus
title: Great Location but noisy during night - Review
text:
These suites are in an ideal location for theatres, restaurants, and picking up tour buses right on the corner of Times Square The suite itself although a little dated is extremely comfortable, spotless clean and spacious, it is great to have a completely separate lounge you can closeout from the bedroom, and with the coffee machine, microwave and little kitchen area it is extremely handy, the only downside is everything's paper cups and not even a plate a knife or teaspoon in the room, I actually went out and bought a mug as I don't like drinking out of cardboard, although that appears normal in NYC.
Also no room service available was a downside especially after a long exhausting day would have liked one day just to eat in the room.
Great bathroom area again very spacious and good shower over bathtub, plenty of hot water, the housekeeping is excellent and brought bathrobes, extra tea coffee on request at no extra charge and plenty of towels, cleanliness again excellent.
The concierge extremely helpful in booking restaurant and general information, nothing too much trouble.
Bar area was good and service excellent although you cannot get a coffee after 11.30am
Seemed crazy to me.
I think thing to remember if booking here it is not a hotel as such so just be aware that all services you get in a 4/5 star hotel are not available but you get the advantage of the space, being able to bring in your own food if you want and a superb location.
The only big problem lies the noise during the night from builders and erection companies banging like mad can be at Mid-night 5 am in the morning there is obviously no restriction here on noise levels, and whilst this is absolutely no fault whatsoever of the hotel it is extremely annoying.
Overall our experience has been excellent and I would definitely recommend it.
Room Tip: Away from lifts is much quieter at least higher than floor 14 See more room tips
